description: http://anidb.net/ch10776 [Chocolat] and http://anidb.net/ch14765 [Vanilla] are little witches. They are good friends as well as rivals for the next queen candidate. To decide who is eligible for the next queen, they came to human world. They compete with each other by collecting hearts of men. Which of the two will become the queen?
